name: Amazon Video: Blur Synopses
description: The episode synopses on Amazon Video sometimes contain spoilers, so here's a style that hides them. Hover over one of the blurred sections to view them.
additional_info:
Changelog:
2018-01-13: Changed (and renamed) the style to apply to all synopses on the site (that I've seen so far).
2017-12-06: The style should work for all regional sites now. Leave a comment if it doesn't.
